txt.en: Dispersed crowds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Suspicious characters can be found around Lake-town.\n\nYou should find suspicious characters in Lake-town who look to be putting up the slanderous notices.
You should examine what you noticed lying near the defeated Easterling, Ut没kel, in Lake-town's underbelly.

'It is not enough to prove my true bloodline. Someone has been planting these rumours - I know, because I have found this.'

She waves a piece of paper in front of you, with the claims of her kinship with Othur written out on it.

'Please, I ask you to track down those who seek to wrongly discredit me and tear down as many of these awful notices as you can find!'
TBD
Put a stop to the slanderous gossip in Lake-town.
TBD
The briber was taking orders from an Easterling!

You have defeated Ut没kel and put a stop to the slanderous gossip in Lake-town. Seeing the same pile of rust in both Esgaroth-of-old and the underbelly of Lake-town has made you wonder if there is some connexion between the two groups of evil men operating in the Dale-lands. It would seem this Akshir, whoever he is, may be behind it all!
Completed
Examine the thing
You notice something nearby the defeated Easterling
Follow the trail of coins
A pile of rust, just like the one you found in Esgaroth-of-old!
'Akshir wanted those bones yesterday! Now you have paid the price!'
'You should not have crossed Akshir! He will kill you for this!'
The briber flees but tears his gold pouch in the process!
The coins mark a clear enough path!
Confront the briber
Remove slanderous notices ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Someone has been posting notices in Lake-town, making false claims such as those about Dagrun's bloodline.
Disperse crowds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Ut没kel can be found in Lake-town's underbelly.\n\nYou should defeat the one behind the slanderous gossip in Lake-town.
TBD
Someone in Lake-town is bribing people to spread rumours. You should find the briber.
Find the briber
The briber in Lake-town has accidentally left a trail of coins behind him.\n\nYou should follow the trail of coins to catch the briber.
Discrediting notices can be found around Lake-town.\n\nYou should find and remove any slanderous notices that you come across.

The Underbelly of Deceit
